<<<api>>>: Activity.setContentView
<<<code>>>: public void onCreate(Bundle savedInstanceState) {
super.onCreate(savedInstanceState);
int layoutId = getIntent().getIntExtra("layout_id", 0);
if (layoutId == 0) {
setContentView(R.layout.default_layout);
} else {
setContentView(layoutId);
}
}
<<<explanation>>>: You can get the layout id from the intent using getIntent().getIntExtra("layout\_id", 0). If the layout id is 0, it means that no specific layout was sent via putExtra, so you can set the content view to the default layout. If the layout id is not 0, you can set the content view to the specific layout that was sent via putExtra.
